original_text: All the people were very surprised and they said to each other, ‘This is very strange. This man Jesus is teaching us something new and he speaks with authority. He can tell bad spirits what they must do. Then they do it.’
korean_text: 다 놀라 서로 물어 이르되 이는 어찜이냐 권위 있는 새 교훈이로다 더러운 귀신들에게 명한즉 순종하는도다 하더라

sentences.original_text: All the people were very surprised
and they said to each other
This man Jesus is teaching us something new
sentences.korean_translation: 이 예수라는 사람은 우리에게 새로운 것을 가르치고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: He can tell bad spirits what they must do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 악한 영들에게 그들이 해야 할 일을 말할 수 있습니다
